MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham, affecting properties in Hazelhurst Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10:28PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10AM on 11December 2020.
